data.title: Where cannabis business is legal in California
data.excerpt: Cannabis is legal in California. But local restrictions on cannabis business create a patchwork of areas where it is and is not legal. As a result, many people cannot get safe products where they live. And the illegal market continues to thrive. 44% Of cities and counties allow at least one type of cannabis business […]
data.author: Chach
